deprecated_yaml.title: The MeteoSwiss YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring MeteoSwiss using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the Swiss Meteo configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

station_no_data.title: MeteoSwiss weather station appears to be gone
station_no_data.description:
The real-time weather station MeteoSwiss is using ({station}) is no longer offering data.

Currently, the only repair possible involves removing and re-adding the MeteoSwiss integration, selecting a new real-time weather station.

Until this repair is made, all real-time weather sensors and reports coming from this station will show as unavailable.

improperly_configured.title: MeteoSwiss integration improperly configured
improperly_configured.description:
The MeteoSwiss integration with entry ID {entry_id} is improperly configured.

Please remove your configuration entry and recreate it.

error.cannot_query_address: OpenStreetMap refused to guess the address for your location; please enter the information manually
error.cannot_query_postcode: OpenStreetMap refused to guess the postal code for your location; please enter the information manually
error.lat: The supplied latitude does not fall between -90 y 90 degrees
error.lon: The supplied longitude does not fall between -180 y 180 degrees
error.invalid_station_name: Station name is invalid; please check https://rudd-o.com/meteostations for station list
error.invalid_postcode: Postal code is invalid; this integration only works with Swiss postal codes
error.update_interval_too_low: The update interval is too low; must be at least 1 minute

user.description: Confirm your geographical position.  This will be used to guess the closest real-time weather station and approximate your postal code for forecasts.
user.title: Location

user_two.description: The postal code is used to look up the 5-day forecast.  The name you enter here will be used for the forecast (weather) entity.
user_two.title: Forecast

user_three.description:
The real-time weather station is used to look up the current weather at the station and provide them as sensors.  Selecting the first option of the list disables real-time weather sensors.

If a weather station is selected, the real-time entity names field is used to name the real-time (sensor) entities.  If no station is chosen, the real-time entity names field is ignored.

https://rudd-o.com/meteostations lists the available real-time weather stations.
user_three.title: Real-time weather
